resources.string: DEFINING NEW BOUNDARIES with its plentitude of technical events like programming contest, marketing strategies, quizzes and ever widening array of events such as Ken-doko, Life Size Chess.

string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: The Ultimate Maths Quiz offers an assorted collection to tease minds and pit wits against the brilliant minds at DTU.
This event tests the ability to make a foolproof marketing plan, whilst creating a marketing strategy that will revolutionize the monotony of the Marketplace
This battle of coding promises to give all programming nerds an opportunity to develop their best codes in C/C++ and prove your mettle
The event would have 3 brainstorming rounds, testing the speed, skill and accuracy of the human brain
Travel through a maze of rounds of mazes to reach the destination. Arrange the mirrors and prisms and guide the laser light.
Come and Play Sudoku & KEN-KEN puzzles with different timed levels.
Ever seen Philospher\'s Stone?? Well, Chess comes to life.
Solve an array of math problems in teams as fast as possible to avoid the dreaded Elimination round
Find the hidden treasure, if you can.
Decode the cipher and find the message.
At last, the festival comes to an end with a grand celebration.
